I’ve only had them for a couple days, but they feel durable and well-made and actually the quality is pretty great for the price. I’m a bit surprised as you never know with jewelry you buy online. The weight of all three necklaces is great - not too heavy not too lightweight. They don’t look cheap and I really appreciate the cute detail on each clasp. The only thing I would say that stood out to me is the gold is a little extra bright or maybe a bit yellow so that may make these pieced look less real, but I like bright things anyway. Will be keeping. I haven’t had them long enough to know if they tarnished, but I usually remove jewelry at the end of each day anyway. I think these will go nicely with many outfits.
